Catalog.description: <font color="#243f60">I</font>s a collection of Product Offerings, intended for a specific DistributionChannel, enhanced with additional information such as SLA parameters, invoicing and shipping details.

lastUpdate.description: Date and time of the last update

type.description: Indicates if the catalog is a product, service or resource catalog

lifecycleStatus.description: Used to indicate the current lifecycle status

validFor.description: The period for which the catalog is valid

Category.description: The category resource is used to group product offerings, service and resource candidates in logical containers. Categories can contain other categories and/or product offerings, resource or service candidates.

lastUpdate.description: Date and time of the last update

lifecycleStatus.description: Used to indicate the current lifecycle status

validFor.description: The period for which the category is valid

parentId.description: Unique identifier of the parent category

isRoot.description: If true, this Boolean indicates that the category is a root of categories

Category_Create.description:
The category resource is used to group product offerings, service and resource candidates in logical containers. Categories can contain other categories and/or product offerings, resource or service candidates.
Skipped properties: id,href

lastUpdate.description: Date and time of the last update

lifecycleStatus.description: Used to indicate the current lifecycle status

validFor.description: The period for which the category is valid

parentId.description: Unique identifier of the parent category

isRoot.description: If true, this Boolean indicates that the category is a root of categories

Category_Update.description:
The category resource is used to group product offerings, service and resource candidates in logical containers. Categories can contain other categories and/or product offerings, resource or service candidates.
Skipped properties: id,href,id,lastUpdate

lifecycleStatus.description: Used to indicate the current lifecycle status

validFor.description: The period for which the category is valid

parentId.description: Unique identifier of the parent category

isRoot.description: If true, this Boolean indicates that the category is a root of categories

ProductOffering.description: Represents entities that are orderable from the provider of the catalog, this resource includes pricing information.

lastUpdate.description: Date and time of the last update

isBundle.description: isBundle determines whether a productOffering represents a single productOffering (false), or a bundle of productOfferings (true).

lifecycleStatus.description: Used to indicate the current lifecycle status

validFor.description: The period for which the productOffering is valid

ProductOffering_Create.description:
Represents entities that are orderable from the provider of the catalog, this resource includes pricing information.

lastUpdate.description: Date and time of the last update

isBundle.description: isBundle determines whether a productOffering represents a single productOffering (false), or a bundle of productOfferings (true).

lifecycleStatus.description: Used to indicate the current lifecycle status

validFor.description: The period for which the productOffering is valid

lifecycleStatus.description: Used to indicate the current lifecycle status

validFor.description: The period for which the productOffering is valid

ProductSpecification.description: Is a detailed description of a tangible or intangible object made available externally in the form of a ProductOffering to customers or other parties playing a party role.

id.description: Unique identifier of the product specification

lastUpdate.description: Date and time of the last update

description.description: A narrative that explains in detail what the product specification is

isBundle.description: isBundle determines whether a productSpecification represents a single productSpecification (false), or a bundle of productSpecification (true).

brand.description: The manufacturer or trademark of the specification

lifecycleStatus.description: Used to indicate the current lifecycle status

validFor.description: The period for which the product specification is valid

productNumber.description: An identification number assigned to uniquely identity the specification

Is a detailed description of a tangible or intangible object made available externally in the form of a ProductOffering to customers or other parties playing a party role.

lastUpdate.description: Date and time of the last update

description.description: A narrative that explains in detail what the product specification is

brand.description: The manufacturer or trademark of the specification

lifecycleStatus.description: Used to indicate the current lifecycle status

ProductSpecification_Update.description:
Is a detailed description of a tangible or intangible object made available externally in the form of a ProductOffering to customers or other parties playing a party role.
Skipped properties: id,href,id,lastUpdate

description.description: A narrative that explains in detail what the product specification is

isBundle.description: isBundle determines whether a productSpecification represents a single productSpecification (false), or a bundle of productSpecification (true).

brand.description: The manufacturer or trademark of the specification

lifecycleStatus.description: Used to indicate the current lifecycle status

validFor.description: The period for which the product specification is valid

productNumber.description: An identification number assigned to uniquely identity the specification

TimePeriod.description: A base / value business entity used to represent a period of time between two timepoints.

startDateTime.description: An instant of time, starting at the TimePeriod

endDateTime.description: An instant of time, ending at the TimePeriod.

RelatedPartyRef.description: RelatedParty reference. RelatedParty defines party or party role linked to a specific entity.

id.description: Unique identifier of a related party

href.description: Reference of the related party, could be a party reference or a partyRole reference

validFor.description: Validity period of the related party

CategoryRef.description: Category reference. The category resource is used to group product offerings, service and resource candidates in logical containers. Categories can contain other categories and/or product offerings, resource or service candidates.

PlaceRef.description: Place reference. Place defines the places where the product offerings are sold.

ServiceLevelAgreementRef.description: ServiceLevelAgreement reference: A service level agreement (SLA) is a type of agreement that represents a formal negotiated agreement between two parties designed to create a common understanding about products, services, priorities, responsibilities, and so forth. The SLA is a set of appropriate procedures and targets formally or informally agreed between parties in order to achieve and maintain specified Quality of Service.

id.description: Unique identifier of service level agreement

href.description: Reference of the service level agreement

name.description: Name of the service level agreement

ProductSpecificationRef.description: Product specification reference: A ProductSpecification is a detailed description of a tangible or intangible object made available externally in the form of a ProductOffering to customers or other parties playing a party role.

id.description: Unique identifier of the product specification

ChannelRef.description: Channel reference. The channel defines the channel for selling product offerings.

ServiceCandidateRef.description: ServiceCandidate reference. ServiceCandidate is an entity that makes a ServiceSpecification available to a catalog.

id.description: Unique identifier of the service candidate

href.description: Unique reference of the service candidate

ResourceCandidateRef.description: ResourceCandidate reference: A resource candidate is an entity that makes a ResourceSpecification available to a catalog.

id.description: Unique identifier of the resource candidate

ProductOfferingPrice.description: Is based on both the basic cost to develop and produce products and the enterprise's policy on revenue targets. This price may be further revised through discounting (prodOfferPriceAlteration). The price, applied for a productOffering may also be influenced by the productOfferingTerm, the customer selected - e.g. a productOffering can be offered with multiple terms, like commitment periods for the contract. The price may be influenced by this productOfferingTerm. A productOffering may be cheaper with a 24 month commitment than with a 12 month commitment.

validFor.description: The period for which the productOfferingPrice is valid

priceType.description: Indicates the price type: recurring, one time, usage

BundledProductOffering.description: A type of ProductOffering that belongs to a grouping of ProductOfferings made available to the market. It inherits of all attributes of ProductOffering.

lifecycleStatus.description: Used to indicate the current lifecycle status

ProductOfferingTerm.description: A condition under which a ProductOffering is made available to Customers. For instance, a productOffering can be offered with multiple commitment periods.

validFor.description: The period for which the productOfferingterm is valid

Price.description: Provides all amounts (tax included, duty free, tax rate), used currency and percentage to apply for ProdOfferPriceAlteration.

taxIncludedAmount.description: All taxes included amount (expressed in the given currency)

dutyFreeAmount.description: All taxes excluded amount (expressed in the given currency)

currencyCode.description: A string used as a code for specifying the currency associated to the given amounts. The ISO4217 norm uses 3 letters to define the currency (for example USD for US dollar or EUR for Euro)

priceType.description: Indicates the price type: recurring, one time, usage

ProductOfferPriceAlteration.description: An amount, usually of money, that modifies a price charged for a productOffering.

validFor.description: The period for which the prodOfferPriceAlteration is valid

priceType.description: Indicates the price type: recurring, one time, usage

applicationDuration.description: Duration during which the prodOfferPriceAlteration applies on the productOffering (for instance 2 months free of charge for the recurring charge)

priceCondition.description: Condition that triggers the price application

ProductSpecCharacteristic.description: A characteristic quality or distinctive feature of a ProductSpecification.  The characteristic can be take on a discrete value, such as color, can take on a range of values, (for example, sensitivity of 100-240 mV), or can be derived from a formula (for example, usage time (hrs) = 30 - talk time *3). Certain characteristics, such as color, may be configured during the ordering or some other process.

description.description: A narrative that explains in detail what the productSpecCharacteristic is

valueType.description: A kind of value that the characteristic can take on, such as numeric, text and so forth

configurable.description: If true, the Boolean indicates that the productSpecCharacteristic is configurable

validFor.description: The period for which the productSpecCharacteristic is valid

ServiceSpecificationRef.description: Service specification reference: ServiceSpecification(s) required to realize a ProductSpecification.

id.description: Unique identifier of the service specification

ProductSpecificationRelationship.description: A migration, substitution, dependency or exclusivity relationship between/among product specifications.

type.description: Type of relationship such as migration, substitution, dependency, exclusivity

validFor.description: The period for which the productSpecificationRelationship is valid

ResourceSpecificationRef.description: Resource Specification reference: The ResourceSpecification is required to realize a ProductSpecification.

id.description: Unique identifier of the resource specification

Attachment.description: Describes a product through video, pictures...

type.description: Attachment type such as video, picture

url.description: Uniform Resource Locator, is a web page address (a subset of URI)

BundledProductSpecification.description: A type of ProductSpecification that belongs to a grouping of ProductSpecifications made available to the market. It inherits of all attributes of ProductSpecification.

id.description: Unique identifier of the product specification

lifecycleStatus.description: Used to indicate the current lifecycle status

ProductSpecCharRelationship.description: An aggregation, migration, substitution, dependency or exclusivity relationship between/among productSpecCharacteristics.

type.description: Type of relationship such as aggregation, migration, substitution, dependency, exclusivity

validFor.description: The period for which the productSpecCharRelationship is valid

ProductSpecCharacteristicValue.description: A number or text that can be assigned to a ProductSpecCharacteristic.

valueType.description: A kind of value that the characteristic can take on, such as numeric, text, and so forth

default.description: Indicates if the value is the default value for a characteristic

value.description: A discrete value that the characteristic can take on

valueFrom.description: The low range value that a characteristic can take on

valueTo.description: The upper range value that a characteristic can take on

validFor.description: The period of time for which a value is applicable

CatalogChangeBatchNotification.description: TheCatalogChangeBatch notification is sent to each listener who has subscribed to receive it.

resourcePath.description: To indicate which entity is concerned

fieldPath.description: details which field is missing, its structure is quite similar to GET filter criteria

CatalogChangeNotification.description: TheCatalogChange notification is sent to each listener who has subscribed to receive it.

resourcePath.description: To indicate which entity is concerned

fieldPath.description: details which field is missing, its structure is quite similar to GET filter criteria

CatalogEvent.description: The Catalog event is generated each time a catalog is updated.

code.description: An integer coding the error type. This is given to caller so he can translate them if required.

message.description: A short localized string that describes the error.

description.description: (optional) A long localized error description if needed. It can contain precise information about which parameter is missing, or what are the identifier acceptable values.

infoURL.description: (optional) A URL to online documentation that provides more information about the error.
